Package chav1961.purelib.basic

This package contains a set of classes for the basic abilities of the library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BitCharSet.BuildCharSetCallback
    This interface describes callback for building charset by criteria
    CharUtils.CharSubstitutionSource
    This interface describes lambda-styled callback for CharUtils.substitute(String, String, SubstitutionSource) call
    CharUtils.SubstitutionSource
    This interface describes lambda-styled callback for CharUtils.substitute(String, String, SubstitutionSource) call
    FSM.FSMCallback<Terminal extends Enum<?>,NonTerminal extends Enum<?>,Exit extends Enum<?>,Parameter>
    This interface describes a callback to process successful FSM state changes.
    GettersAndSettersFactory.GetterAndSetter
    This interface can be used as type of variable to store any getter and setter instance.
    ReusableInstances.PseudoConstructor<T>
    This iterface resets existent instance if the class to the initial state
    ReusableInstances.TrueConstructor<T>
    This interface returns newly created instance to use in the cache
    StackedFSM.StackedFSMCallback<Terminal extends Enum<?>,NonTerminal extends Enum<?>,Exit extends Enum<?>,Stack,Parameter>
    This interface describes a callback to process successful stacked FSM state changes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLoggerFacade
    This class implements basic functionality for the LoggerFacade interface.
    AbstractScriptEngine
    This class implements basic functionality for the ScriptEngine interface.
    AbstractScriptEngineFactory
    This class implements basic functionality for the ScriptEngineFactory interface.
    AndOrTree<T>
    This class is a sort of fast prefix tree.
    AsmScriptEngineFactory
    This class implements ScriptEngineFactory functionality for the Java Byte code Macro Assembler (see AsmWriter).
    AssemblerTemplateRepo Deprecated
    AssemblerTemplateRepo.NameKeeper
    This class is used in conjunction with the AssemblerTemplateRepo class to support name substitutions (see AssemblerTemplateRepo description)
    BitCharSet
    This class implements a quick restricted set of characters.
    CharUtils
    This class contains implementation of the most-commonly-used char data parsing/printing functions in the system.
    ClassLoaderWrapper
    This class is a wrapper to class loader for the current thread.
    ConsoleCommandManager
    This class is a simplest implementation of the console command manager.
    DefaultLoggerFacade
    This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the java.util.logging package.
    ExtendedBitCharSet
    This class implements a quick non-restricted set of characters.
    FSM<Terminal extends Enum<?>,NonTerminal extends Enum<?>,Exit extends Enum<?>,Parameter>
    This class is an implementation of the Finite State Machine (FSM).
    FSM.FSMLine<Terminal,NonTerminal,Exit>
    This class describes one line of the FSM jump table.
    GettersAndSettersFactory
    This class contains a factory method to build getters and setters for primitive and referenced items in the class and/or it's instance.
    GettersAndSettersFactory.BooleanGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive boolean field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.ByteGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive byte field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.CharGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive char field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.DoubleGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive double field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.FloatGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive float field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.IntGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive int field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.LongGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive long field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.ObjectGetterAndSetter<T>
    This class implements getter and setter to the referenced field in the class or instance
    GettersAndSettersFactory.ShortGetterAndSetter
    This class implements getter and setter to the primitive short field in the class or instance
    LineByLineProcessor
    This utility class supports line-by-line processing for the character streams.
    LongIdMap<T>
    This class implements a special king of map, oriented to use with AndOrTree class.
    NullLoggerFacade
    This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the empty target log file.
    OrdinalSyntaxTree<Cargo>
    This class is an ordinal implementation of SyntaxTreeInterface interface.
    PluggableClassLoader
    This class is an implementation of class loader, that can install and uninstall jars with the additional classes on-the-fly.
    PureLibSettings
    This class keeps basic settings for the Pure Library.
    PureLogger
    This class is a wrapper for LoggerFacade to the standard JRE Logger functionality.
    ReusableInstances<T>
    This utility class can be used to reduce memory garbage.
    SequenceIterator<T>
    This class implements iterator functionality based on a list of nested iterators.
    StackedFSM<Terminal extends Enum<?>,NonTerminal extends Enum<?>,Stack,Exit extends Enum<?>,Parameter>
    This class is an implementation of the Stacked Finite State Machine (FSM).
    StackedFSM.FSMLine<Terminal,NonTerminal,Stack,Exit>
    This class describes one line of the stacked FSM jump table.
    StandardJRELoggerFacade
    This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the java.util.logging target log file.
    SubstitutableProperties
    This class is an extension of the standard Properties class to support automatic substitutions and data type conversions when getting properties.
    SystemErrLoggerFacade
    This class is an implementation of LoggerFacade interface for the System.err target log file.
    TemporaryStore
    This class is a store manager for temporary files.
    Utils
    This class contains implementation of the useful actions in the system
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StackedFSM.StackAction
    Stack action for the FSM jumps

Package chav1961.purelib.basic Description

This package contains a set of classes for the basic abilities of the library. They includes:

  • AndOrTree class to implement quick name/id tree for using in the parsers
  • BitCharSet and ExtendedBitCharSet classes to quick classification of the characters (similar to Character.isDigit(char) or Character.isJavaIdentifierPart(char) methods)
  • ConsoleCommandManager class to implement simple-and-easy console command processing in the Java console-oriented applications
  • a set of logger facades to prevent your application from the ZOO of huge amount of loggers
  • LineByLineProcessor class for quick splitting input source to lines and organizing it's line-by-line processing
  • PluggableClassLoader class to implement simple plug-in mechanism in your application
  • SubstitutableProperties class to process property files content with automatic substitutions and data conversions
Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
